{{Quote|Halder, to the Builders.|Lord Commander Jeor Mormont|You Win or You Die}}

'''Halder''' is an unidentified background character in the [[Season 1|first season]]. He is a newly-made Builder of the [[Night's Watch]], of the same group of recruits as [[Jon Snow]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Halder is sixteen years old when he joins the Watch. Jon thinks him incredibly strong, but easy to anticipate. Halder had been an apprentice stonemason before coming to the Wall and, like [[Grenn]] and [[Pyp]], becomes friends with Jon.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
Halder is present during the speech Lord Commander [[Jeor Mormont]] gave to the "graduating" recruits. He is assigned to the Builders.<ref>"[[You Win or You Die]]"</ref>
